ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Title: "Feelng Blue"- Part 2
ComicInfo.Summary: "Feelng Blue"- Part 2: As the Blue Ninjas press their attack on the Commander, Cobra's aided by the Joes (who alos boarded the freighter as well, fighting off the Cobra contingent on board), as well as Snake-Eyes and the Baroness, reinforced by Mindbender and the B.A.T.S. Meanwhile, as Storm Shadow makes his way to the battle, he picks up Sensei Moskovina, no worse for the wear, to also aid vs. the cyborg ninjas.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 10:19:53. [Issue ID 942132]
